name: California Red-legged Frog
text:
Keep a look out for any of these species!

Medium-large (to 5.2 in.) true frog; red on underside of hind legs in adults. Moderately aquatic, this species is found in slow streams and rivers, ponds, marshes and lakes, but may wander away from open water into damp woodlands during wet season. (LMU Biology)
